display_html:
data Depth
  • = RootK
  • | AccountK
  • | PaymentK
  • | DelegationK
  • | ScriptK
name: Depth RootK AccountK PaymentK DelegationK ScriptK

display_html:
class GenMasterKey (key :: Depth -> * -> *) where
  • type SecondFactor key :: *
  • genMasterKeyFromMnemonic :: SomeMnemonic -> SecondFactor key -> key RootK XPrv
  • genMasterKeyFromXPrv :: XPrv -> key RootK XPrv
name: GenMasterKey SecondFactor genMasterKeyFromXPrv genMasterKeyFromMnemonic

display_html:
class HardDerivation (key :: Depth -> * -> *) where
  • type AccountIndexDerivationType key :: DerivationType
  • type AddressIndexDerivationType key :: DerivationType
  • type WithRole key :: *
  • deriveAccountPrivateKey :: key RootK XPrv -> Index (AccountIndexDerivationType key) AccountK -> key AccountK XPrv
  • deriveAddressPrivateKey :: key AccountK XPrv -> WithRole key -> Index (AddressIndexDerivationType key) PaymentK -> key PaymentK XPrv
name: HardDerivation AccountIndexDerivationType AddressIndexDerivationType WithRole deriveAccountPrivateKey deriveAddressPrivateKey

display_html:
class HardDerivation key => SoftDerivation (key :: Depth -> * -> *) where

name: SoftDerivation deriveAddressPublicKey

data Script (elem :: *)

  • | ActiveFromSlot Natural
  • | ActiveUntilSlot Natural
name: Script RequireSignatureOf RequireAllOf RequireAnyOf RequireSomeOf ActiveFromSlot ActiveUntilSlot
